mapper.insert: INSERT INTO 顧客.顧客 (顧客ID, 顧客番号, 顧客名, 顧客名カナ) VALUES ( #{customer.customerId.value}, #{customerNumber.value}, #{customer.customerName.name.value}, #{customer.customerName.nameKana.value} )
mapper.select: SELECT 顧客ID AS "customerId.value", 顧客名 AS "name.value" FROM 顧客.顧客

SELECT 顧客ID AS "customerId.value", 顧客名 AS "name.value", 顧客名カナ AS "nameKana.value" FROM 顧客.顧客 WHERE 顧客名 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{customerSearchCriteria.customerName}, '%') OR 顧客名カナ LIKE CONCAT('%', #{customerSearchCriteria.customerName}, '%')

SELECT 顧客.顧客ID AS "customerId.value", 顧客名 AS "customerName.name.value", 顧客名カナ AS "customerName.nameKana.value", 連絡先.都道府県 AS "contact.address.prefecture", 連絡先.住所 AS "contact.address.addressLine", 連絡先.電話番号 AS "contact.phoneNumber.value", 連絡先.担当者名 AS "contact.personInCharge" FROM 顧客.顧客 INNER JOIN 顧客.連絡先 ON 顧客.顧客ID = 連絡先.顧客ID WHERE 顧客.顧客ID = #{customerId.value}
